movie.title: Race for the Poles
movie.plot: The history of the struggles by Robert Peary, Frederick Cook, Roald Amundsen, Robert Scott, and Ernest Shackleton to be the first men to reach the North and South Poles.

movie.title: Amundsen
movie.plot: The life and facts of Norwegian explorer Roald Amundsen, the first man to arrive on the South Pole.
